p.b: For each day's reading question, write your name, section, table, and group number on the upper right hand corner of your answer and hand it in at the start of class that day
Oct 14 W06D3 Problem Solving 04: Conservation of Momentum

problem.p: 1. When is the momentum of a system constant?

2. Compare and contrast the problem solving strategies for energy conservation and momentum conservation? In particular, identify any major differences i.e. criteria for momentum or mechanical energy to be constant, vectors or scalars, etc?
